Description: Hourly land surface reanalysis at ~11 km resolution (ERA5-Land), including precipitation and 2m temperatures
Monthly high-resolution (~4 km) global climate data including temperature
Monthly global land surface model outputs (FEWS NET FLDAS Noah) – precipitation
3-hourly global land surface model outputs (e.g. evaporation
Daily global land surface variables (incl. soil moisture and evapotranspiration) from GLDAS-2.2 (Catchment model with GRACE DA)
Monthly global precipitation (IMERG Final) at 0.1° with gauge adjustments
Daily 1-km gridded weather data for North America: max/min temperature
Daily 0.5° global land precipitation from NOAA CPC Unified (rain-gauge analysis; includes number of gauges per grid cell)
Daily 0.05° (~5.6 km) precipitation climate data record from PERSIANN (infrared satellite estimates adjusted with gauge data)
Daily quasi-global (50°S–50°N) precipitation combining satellite IR estimates with in-situ gauges
